channel.title: RuneKings needs YOU!
channel.description:
[center]Hi, I'm currently working on a server by myself, the devolpment thread can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,414648.0.html This thread is for the actual devolpment for the server, to show you what I've got added and a few sneak peaks to the server.
This is the suggestions thread for the project, I want to see what players are looking for in a server, so I can possibly add it to mine. So please, tell me what you guys look for in a server.
Here are somethings not to suggest: Construction Summoning High exp rates, example: 1000 (Will take lower though)
[u]These will never be added to my server[/u]
Suggestions that will be added: None so far, get to suggesting! [/center]

item.title: RuneKings needs YOU!
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

If you want suggestions for your server you may request them on your Server development thread, also use that thread for showing previews of the server. This is for server-help related questions only.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneKings needs YOU!
item.dc:creator: @Rune.Kings Rune.Kings
item.description:
@Rune.Kings wrote:

[center]Hi, I’m currently working on a server by myself, the devolpment thread can be found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,414648.0.html
This thread is for the actual devolpment for the server, to show you what I’ve got added and a few sneak peaks to the server.

This is the suggestions thread for the project, I want to see what players are looking for in a server, so I can possibly add it to mine. So please, tell me what you guys look for in a server.

Here are somethings not to suggest:
Construction
Summoning
High exp rates, example: 1000 (Will take lower though)

These will never be added to my server

Suggestions that will be added:
None so far, get to suggesting!
[/center]

Read full topic
